name: Yotts Orren
Lore: 'Kadas''sa''Nikto. Smuggler who stole from shipments going in and out of Jabba''s Palace. Part of Jabba''s sail barge crew. Not trusted by anyone.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Opponent''s combat vehicles are each power -2 at same site. Once per game, may take Mechanical Failure and/or Free Ride into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
